attributes.action: Get "Bullying Counsellors" For Schools For Children Who Need To Speak To Someone About Their Concerns Of Others Being Bullied, Being Bullied Themselves Or Being A Bully Themselves. Somebody Who Wouldn't Be Informed Of Who The Person Was So You Can Speak To Them Anonymously.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Should Get "Bullying Counsellors" For Schools For Children Who Need To Speak To Someone [Who Knows About This Sort Of Thing And How To Deal With It] About Their Concerns Of Others Being Bullied, Being Bullied Themselves Or Actually Being A Bully. Somebody Who Wouldn't Be Informed Of Who The Person Was So You Can Speak To Them Anonymously, With No Fear Of Others Finding Out.
